TEXT.TITLE: CORROON AND BLACK <CBL> COMPLETES ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Carroon and Black Corp said it completed the acquisition of <Poggi-Harrison Agency Inc> and <Risk Control Inc>. Terms of the acquisitions were not disclosed. Separately, Carroon said it also completed the acquisition of <Rosskopf, Rapp and Schmidt Insurance Agency>, based in El Monte, Calif. Reuter
